appStatus.title: Platform status
appStatus.subtitle: Check the operation of SEND, view the history of disruptions and download the related certificates enforceable against third parties. Each certification certifies a disruption: it may be useful if this has involved a notification intended for you.

statusDescription.not-ok: There's a disruption going on. For more details, see the table below.

noFileAvailableByStatus.OK: The certificate will be available shortly
noFileAvailableByStatus.KO: The certificate will be available at the end of the disruption
